answer: You may find it at https://docs.terra.money/
You can request money on the testnet using https://faucet.terra.money/
You can have access to the API doc at https://lcd.terra.dev/swagger/
You can access transaction content using https://finder.terra.money/ or https://finder.extraterrestrial.money/
You can access the wiki at https://terrawiki.org/
You can access the gas price at https://fcd.terra.dev/v1/txs/gas_prices
You can find system configuration here: https://docs.terra.money/docs/full-node/run-a-full-terra-node/system-config.html
You can query `https://api.terra.dev/tx-history/station/{address}` to retrieve an address transactions history
